Uses of Class
screens.Screen

  • Packages that use Screen 
    Package Description
    customization  
    game  
    screens  

    • Uses of Screen in customization

      Subclasses of Screen in customization 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  DrawingScreen
      The DrawingScreen class encompasses all of the functions the user needs to draw and customize Entities.

    • Uses of Screen in game

      Subclasses of Screen in game 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  GameOverScreen
      The GameOverScreen class presents the display that appears when the character loses all three of its lives.
      class  GameScreen
      A screen that displays all the components used to run the game.

    • Uses of Screen in screens

      Subclasses of Screen in screens 
      Modifier and Type Class and Description
      class  MenuScreen
      The MenuScreen class displays the initial screen when the user first runs the program.
